info.name: Library Management System - Updated API Collection
info.description: Complete RESTful API collection for Library Management System with all CRUD operations, role-based access control, and user activity logging. Updated after code cleanup and simplification.

request.description: User login with username and password
Public user registration (defaults to MEMBER role)
Get available roles for public registration
Get all books (All roles can access)
Get books that are available for borrowing
Get books filtered by language ID
Search books by title, author, or content
